headline: DeepSeek Is Good News For The AI Gold Rush
summary: DeepSeek caused lots of wild gyrations of most tech stocks. Net-net, the tech market ended down only 3-4%. That many big techs rose sharply reminds us of what stage we are in the gold rush.
